ble-scan-report-intv.help: Time between running Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) reports (10 - 3600 sec, default = 30).
ble-scan-report-intv.name: ble-scan-report-intv

client-idle-timeout.help: Time after which a client is considered idle and times out (20 - 3600 sec, default = 300, 0 for no timeout).
client-idle-timeout.name: client-idle-timeout

discovery-interval.help: Time between discovery requests (2 - 180 sec, default = 5).
discovery-interval.name: discovery-interval

drma-interval.help: Dynamic radio mode assignment (DRMA) schedule interval in minutes (10 - 1440, default = 60).
drma-interval.name: drma-interval

echo-interval.help: Time between echo requests sent by the managed WTP, AP, or FortiAP (1 - 255 sec, default = 30).
echo-interval.name: echo-interval

fake-ap-log.help: Time between recording logs about fake APs if periodic fake AP logging is configured (0 - 1440 min, default = 1).
fake-ap-log.name: fake-ap-log

ipsec-intf-cleanup.help: Time period to keep IPsec VPN interfaces up after WTP sessions are disconnected (30 - 3600 sec, default = 120).
ipsec-intf-cleanup.name: ipsec-intf-cleanup

radio-stats-interval.help: Time between running radio reports (1 - 255 sec, default = 15).
radio-stats-interval.name: radio-stats-interval

rogue-ap-log.help: Time between logging rogue AP messages if periodic rogue AP logging is configured (0 - 1440 min, default = 0).
rogue-ap-log.name: rogue-ap-log

sta-capability-interval.help: Time between running station capability reports (1 - 255 sec, default = 30).
sta-capability-interval.name: sta-capability-interval

sta-locate-timer.help: Time between running client presence flushes to remove clients that are listed but no longer present (0 - 86400 sec, default = 1800).
sta-locate-timer.name: sta-locate-timer

sta-stats-interval.help: Time between running client (station) reports (1 - 255 sec, default = 1).
sta-stats-interval.name: sta-stats-interval

vap-stats-interval.help: Time between running Virtual Access Point (VAP) reports (1 - 255 sec, default = 15).
vap-stats-interval.name: vap-stats-interval
